account.externalId.description: Select the Accounts Payable account that will be affected by this transaction.Click New to set up a new account.For details on accounts, go to <_TABNAME=LIST_ACCOUNT_> > <_TASKCATEGORY=LIST_ACCOUNT_> > Chart of Accounts.
account.externalId.name: account.externalId

account.internalId.description: Select the Accounts Payable account that will be affected by this transaction.Click New to set up a new account.For details on accounts, go to <_TABNAME=LIST_ACCOUNT_> > <_TASKCATEGORY=LIST_ACCOUNT_> > Chart of Accounts.
account.internalId.name: account.internalId

account.name.description: Select the Accounts Payable account that will be affected by this transaction.Click New to set up a new account.For details on accounts, go to <_TABNAME=LIST_ACCOUNT_> > <_TASKCATEGORY=LIST_ACCOUNT_> > Chart of Accounts.
account.name.name: account.name

approvalStatus.externalId.description: The approval status of this bill shows in this field.Accept the default status or choose one of the following:    * Approved – No further review or processing is required before a payment is processed.    * Pending Approval – Someone with permission must approve the bill before a payment can be processed for it.
approvalStatus.externalId.name: approvalStatus.externalId

approvalStatus.internalId.description: The approval status of this bill shows in this field.Accept the default status or choose one of the following:    * Approved – No further review or processing is required before a payment is processed.    * Pending Approval – Someone with permission must approve the bill before a payment can be processed for it.
approvalStatus.internalId.name: approvalStatus.internalId

approvalStatus.name.description: The approval status of this bill shows in this field.Accept the default status or choose one of the following:    * Approved – No further review or processing is required before a payment is processed.    * Pending Approval – Someone with permission must approve the bill before a payment can be processed for it.
approvalStatus.name.name: approvalStatus.name

availableVendorCredit.description: From the web services perspective, this field is available only with the get, getList, and asyncGetList operations. This field is not available through search.For more information about this field, refer to the field help in the UI. That is, navigate to the record and click the Available Vendor Credit label. In response, the system displays a popup window that contains more information about the field.
availableVendorCredit.name: availableVendorCredit

billAddressList.externalId.description: In the Vendor Select field, choose a vendor.Verify the billing address displayed in the Vendor field.
billAddressList.externalId.name: billAddressList.externalId

billAddressList.internalId.description: In the Vendor Select field, choose a vendor.Verify the billing address displayed in the Vendor field.
billAddressList.internalId.name: billAddressList.internalId

billAddressList.name.description: In the Vendor Select field, choose a vendor.Verify the billing address displayed in the Vendor field.
billAddressList.name.name: billAddressList.name

creditLimit.description: This is a read-only field that returns the credit limit set for the vendor.
creditLimit.name: creditLimit

currency.externalId.description: The transaction currency for this bill is shown here.If this bill was created from a purchase order, the currency on the originating purchase order is shown, and you cannot change the currency on the bill.
currency.externalId.name: currency.externalId

currency.internalId.description: The transaction currency for this bill is shown here.If this bill was created from a purchase order, the currency on the originating purchase order is shown, and you cannot change the currency on the bill.
currency.internalId.name: currency.internalId

currency.name.description: The transaction currency for this bill is shown here.If this bill was created from a purchase order, the currency on the originating purchase order is shown, and you cannot change the currency on the bill.
currency.name.name: currency.name

currencyName.description: A read only field that defaults to the currency associated with the customer referenced by the entity field.
currencyName.name: currencyName

customForm.externalId.description: Select the appropriate standard or custom form to use.
customForm.externalId.name: customForm.externalId

customForm.internalId.description: Select the appropriate standard or custom form to use.
customForm.internalId.name: customForm.internalId

customForm.name.description: Select the appropriate standard or custom form to use.
customForm.name.name: customForm.name

department.externalId.description: References a value in a user-defined list at Setup > Company > Classifications > Departments. This field is required when Departments is enabled at Setup > Accounting > Accounting Preferences. Depending on account configuration, this field may need to be set at the item line level.
department.externalId.name: department.externalId

department.internalId.description: References a value in a user-defined list at Setup > Company > Classifications > Departments. This field is required when Departments is enabled at Setup > Accounting > Accounting Preferences. Depending on account configuration, this field may need to be set at the item line level.
department.internalId.name: department.internalId

department.name.description: References a value in a user-defined list at Setup > Company > Classifications > Departments. This field is required when Departments is enabled at Setup > Accounting > Accounting Preferences. Depending on account configuration, this field may need to be set at the item line level.
department.name.name: department.name

discountAmount.description: A read-only field that returns the amount discounted on this bill.
discountAmount.name: discountAmount

discountDate.description: A read-only field that returns the last day you can pay this bill in order to receive a discount.
discountDate.name: discountDate

dueDate.description: Sets the due date for the bill. Defaults to the current date.
dueDate.name: dueDate

entityTaxRegNum.externalId.description: The tax registration number for this entity displays here.
entityTaxRegNum.externalId.displayName: Vendor Tax Reg. Number - External id
entityTaxRegNum.externalId.name: entityTaxRegNum.externalId

entityTaxRegNum.internalId.description: The tax registration number for this entity displays here.
entityTaxRegNum.internalId.displayName: Vendor Tax Reg. Number - Internal id
entityTaxRegNum.internalId.name: entityTaxRegNum.internalId

entityTaxRegNum.name.description: The tax registration number for this entity displays here.
entityTaxRegNum.name.name: entityTaxRegNum.name

exchangeRate.description: Required on Add. Defaults to the rate associated with the Vendor set in the entity field.
exchangeRate.name: exchangeRate

landedCostPerLine.description: Check this box to enter a landed cost per line item.
landedCostPerLine.name: landedCostPerLine

location.externalId.description: References a value in a user-defined list at Setup > Company > Classifications > Locations. This field is required when Make Locations Mandatory is enabled at Setup > Accounting > Accounting Preferences. Depending on account configuration, this field may need to be set at the item line level.
location.externalId.name: location.externalId

location.internalId.description: References a value in a user-defined list at Setup > Company > Classifications > Locations. This field is required when Make Locations Mandatory is enabled at Setup > Accounting > Accounting Preferences. Depending on account configuration, this field may need to be set at the item line level.
location.internalId.name: location.internalId

location.name.description: References a value in a user-defined list at Setup > Company > Classifications > Locations. This field is required when Make Locations Mandatory is enabled at Setup > Accounting > Accounting Preferences. Depending on account configuration, this field may need to be set at the item line level.
location.name.name: location.name

memo.description: Enter a memo that will appear on such reports as the 2-line Accounts Payable Register.
memo.name: memo

nextApprover.externalId.description: This field displays the next person set to approve this bill via approval routing.
nextApprover.externalId.name: nextApprover.externalId

nextApprover.internalId.description: This field displays the next person set to approve this bill via approval routing.
nextApprover.internalId.name: nextApprover.internalId

nextApprover.name.description: This field displays the next person set to approve this bill via approval routing.
nextApprover.name.name: nextApprover.name

nexus.externalId.description: This field shows the nexus of the transaction. NetSuite automatically populates this field based on the nexus lookup logic. You can override the transaction nexus and tax registration number that NetSuite automatically selects by checking the Nexus Override box. When you select a different nexus in the dropdown list, the corresponding tax registration number is automatically selected in the Subsidiary Tax Reg. Number field.
nexus.externalId.name: nexus.externalId

nexus.internalId.description: This field shows the nexus of the transaction. NetSuite automatically populates this field based on the nexus lookup logic. You can override the transaction nexus and tax registration number that NetSuite automatically selects by checking the Nexus Override box. When you select a different nexus in the dropdown list, the corresponding tax registration number is automatically selected in the Subsidiary Tax Reg. Number field.
nexus.internalId.name: nexus.internalId

nexus.name.description: This field shows the nexus of the transaction. NetSuite automatically populates this field based on the nexus lookup logic. You can override the transaction nexus and tax registration number that NetSuite automatically selects by checking the Nexus Override box. When you select a different nexus in the dropdown list, the corresponding tax registration number is automatically selected in the Subsidiary Tax Reg. Number field.
nexus.name.name: nexus.name

paymentHold.description: Check the Payment Hold box to apply a payment hold on a disputed bill:    * The Make Payment button does not appear on the vendor bill and a vendor payment for that bill cannot be processed.    * Vendor bills subject to a payment hold do not appear on the bill payments page.    * The Electronic Payment SuiteApp does not process payments that are subject to a payment hold.
paymentHold.name: paymentHold

postingPeriod.externalId.description: Required on Add when the Accounting Periods feature is enabled.
postingPeriod.externalId.name: postingPeriod.externalId

postingPeriod.internalId.description: Required on Add when the Accounting Periods feature is enabled.
postingPeriod.internalId.name: postingPeriod.internalId

postingPeriod.name.description: Required on Add when the Accounting Periods feature is enabled.
postingPeriod.name.name: postingPeriod.name

subsidiary.externalId.description: Enter the subsidiary you want to associate with this transaction.
subsidiary.externalId.name: subsidiary.externalId

subsidiary.internalId.description: Enter the subsidiary you want to associate with this transaction.
subsidiary.internalId.name: subsidiary.internalId

subsidiary.name.description: Enter the subsidiary you want to associate with this transaction.
subsidiary.name.name: subsidiary.name

subsidiaryTaxRegNum.externalId.description: This field shows the tax registration number of the transaction nexus. NetSuite automatically populates this field based on the nexus lookup logic. You can override the transaction nexus and tax registration number that NetSuite automatically selects by checking the Nexus Override box. When you select a different tax registration number in the dropdown list, the corresponding nexus is automatically selected in the Nexus field.
subsidiaryTaxRegNum.externalId.displayName: Subsidiary Tax Reg. Number - External id
subsidiaryTaxRegNum.externalId.name: subsidiaryTaxRegNum.externalId

subsidiaryTaxRegNum.internalId.description: This field shows the tax registration number of the transaction nexus. NetSuite automatically populates this field based on the nexus lookup logic. You can override the transaction nexus and tax registration number that NetSuite automatically selects by checking the Nexus Override box. When you select a different tax registration number in the dropdown list, the corresponding nexus is automatically selected in the Nexus field.
subsidiaryTaxRegNum.internalId.displayName: Subsidiary Tax Reg. Number - Internal id
subsidiaryTaxRegNum.internalId.name: subsidiaryTaxRegNum.internalId

subsidiaryTaxRegNum.name.description: This field shows the tax registration number of the transaction nexus. NetSuite automatically populates this field based on the nexus lookup logic. You can override the transaction nexus and tax registration number that NetSuite automatically selects by checking the Nexus Override box. When you select a different tax registration number in the dropdown list, the corresponding nexus is automatically selected in the Nexus field.
subsidiaryTaxRegNum.name.name: subsidiaryTaxRegNum.name

tax2Total.description: NetSuite multiplies the tax rate by the taxable total of line items and enters it here.
tax2Total.name: tax2Total

taxDetailsOverride.description: Check this box to override the tax information on the Tax Details subtab of the transaction. Only roles with at least the Edit level of the Tax Details Tab permission can override the tax details.
taxDetailsOverride.name: taxDetailsOverride

taxRegOverride.description: Check this box to override the values in the Nexus and Subsidiary Tax Reg. Number fields. Only roles with at least the Edit level of the Tax Details Tab permission can override the values that NetSuite automatically selects in these fields.
taxRegOverride.name: taxRegOverride

taxTotal.description: NetSuite multiplies the tax rate by the taxable total of line items and enters it here.
taxTotal.name: taxTotal

terms.externalId.description: References a value in a user-defined list at Setup > Accounting > Setup Tasks > Accounting Lists > New > Terms.
terms.externalId.name: terms.externalId

terms.internalId.description: References a value in a user-defined list at Setup > Accounting > Setup Tasks > Accounting Lists > New > Terms.
terms.internalId.name: terms.internalId

terms.name.description: References a value in a user-defined list at Setup > Accounting > Setup Tasks > Accounting Lists > New > Terms.
terms.name.name: terms.name

tranDate.description: Required on Add. Defaults to the current date.
tranDate.name: tranDate

tranId.description: Sets the number to identify this transaction, such as the vendor's invoice number.
tranId.name: tranId

transactionNumber.description: By default, transaction lists display only the Number field in searches and reporting. If you plan to include the new Transaction Number field, be aware that this value will be the different from the value in the Number field for the twelve transaction types available through Version 2014 Release 1.For the transaction types available through previous releases, these two values will be the same.Note: The Transaction Number field is visible by default on standard NetSuite forms and invisible by default on customized forms. You can customize a form to display this field.
transactionNumber.name: transactionNumber

userTotal.description: A read-only field that returns the total amount of the transaction. check this -- in the UI, this can be entered but then is overwritten on submit.
userTotal.name: userTotal
